titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 31) making further continuing appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2019, and for other purposes, and providing for proceedings during the period from February 15, 2019, through February 22, 2019.

Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 31) making further continuing appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2019, and for other purposes, and providing for proceedings during the period from February 15, 2019, through February 22, 2019.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-10, by Mr. Perlmutter.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 8.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 131.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 195 (Roll no. 85).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 196 (Roll no. 86).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report on H.J.Res. 31 (FY2019 Department of Homeland Security appropriations).
